txt.en:
'[placeholder], my friend, you have the look of one who is growing ready to leave. I want to thank you for all that you have done.

'Galtrev is the largest village in Dunland, and it is not far to the south of here in Pren Gwydh. Surely you will want to stop there as you make your way through Dunland.

'You are welcome back any time.'
'What do you want here, stranger? Why should the White Hand grant you admittance?\n\n'I'm not sure I like the way you're looking at me, [placeholder].'
'You will find Galtrev if you take the road south. Make sure you come back to visit, if you can! You will be missed by all here, [placeholder].'
Galtrev, the largest village of Dunland, is in Pren Gwydh to the south of the Bonevales.
Gain admittance to the village of Galtrev in Pren Gwydh
Galtrev, the main village of Pren Gwydh, can be found by taking the road south from the Bonevales.\n\nYou should go to Galtrev as you make your way through Dunland.
